definition: toweling consisting of coarse absorbent cotton or linen fabric, to make a long pass or throw to a teammate, the distance of which generally covers a large portion of the playing field
details:
noun
- toweling consisting of coarse absorbent cotton or linen fabric
= synonyms: huckaback
- a long pass or throw made in sports to a teammate, generally covering a large portion of the playing field
verb
- to make a long pass or throw to a teammate, the distance of which generally covers a large portion of the playing field
= example: to make a long pass or throw to a teammate, the distance of which generally covers a large portion of the playing field
